original_text: And he put them on the shoulders of the ephod, that they should be stones for a memorial to the children of Israel; as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 에봇 어깨받이에 달아 이스라엘의 아들들을 기념하는 보석을 삼았으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he put them on the shoulders of the ephod
that they should be stones for a memorial
